  "Initiated By" : "CONNECTICUT",
  "Resolution" : "Consent",
  "SanctionDetails" : [ ],
  "Broker Comment" : "AS A RESULT OF AN INVESTIGATION BY THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT, OFFICE OF THE BANKING COMMISSIONER, THE DIVISION FOUND THAT THE KEYSTONE SOCIETY INC., SHEA AND OTHERS OFFERED FOR SALE SECURITIES WHICH WERE NOT REGISTERED NOR EXEMPT; MADE UNTRUE STATEMENTS OF MATERIAL FACTS; OMITTED TO STATE MATERIAL FACTS NECESSARY IN ORDER TO MAKE STATEMENTS, IN LIGHT OF THE CIRCUMSTANCES UNDER WHICH THEY WERE MADE, NOT MISLEADING; AND ENGAGED IN ACTS AND PRACTICES WHICH WOULD OPERATE AS A FRAUD OR DECEIT UPON POTENTIAL INVESTORS; THAT KEYSTONE, SHEA AND OTHERS WERE UNREGISTERED AGENTS IN VIOLATION OF SECTION 36-474 OF THE ACT. THE COMMISSIONER ORDERED THAT KEYSTONE, SHEA AND OTHERS CEASE AND DESIST FROM ANY OFFER OR SALE OF SECURITIES IN OR FROM CONNECTICUT. ON 11/4/86, A CONSENT ORDER WAS ENTERED WITH THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT, DEPARTMENT OF BANKING, SECURITIES AND BUSINESS INVESTMENTS DIVISION WHEREIN IT WAS AGREED THAT SHEA WILL BE REMOVED FROM THE CEASE AND DESIST ORDER. IN CONSIDERATION OF THE WITHDRAWING FROM THE ORDER SHEA AGREES THAT NONE OF THE VIOLATIONS ALLEGED IN THE ORDER WILL OCCUR IN THE FUTURE."
}
